entry.title: GitHub - akavel/up
entry.summary: A cli tool for writing pipes with instant live preview

entry.title: Beeper - All Your Chats In One App
entry.summary: Beeper is a unified inbox app, which uses Matrix bridges. The app has a subscription fee. But an ansible script is available for self-hosts to deploy the bridges and those will probably work with other Matrix client. I need to tinker with that at some point.

entry.title: Replacing Jupyter Notebook with Org Mode
entry.summary: As much as I like VS Code's notebook interface, I am going to replace it with Org mode soon™. This is a guide that's going to help.

entry.title: Edward Snowden at Private Investment Club Zoom Meeting
entry.summary: If you're getting exposed, might as well get exposed by Snowden himself.

entry.title: Configure Zotero to retrieve PDF from Sci-Hub automatically
entry.summary: This is going to save a few extra clicks.

entry.title: Addiction to Outrage
entry.summary: Outrage is like a lot of other things that feel good but over time devour us from the inside out. And it’s even more insidious than most vices because we don’t even consciously acknowledge that it’s a pleasure. — Tim Kreider

entry.title: GitHub - osmoscraft/osmosfeed
entry.summary: An RSS reader, powered by Github Actions and hosted as Github Pages
